DOC.brief_title: Enoxamed Study Treatment Acute Coronary Syndromes
DOC.detailed_description: Single-center randomize control trial , single-blind , include patient acute coronary syndrome confirm , measure anti-Xa activity H0 H4.the study do two group ; ENOXAMED® group : In case patient receive injection enoxaparin ( ENOXAMED® ; Unimed Laboratories ) intravenously . Curative dose ( 100 IU/10 kg ) . Control group ( LOVENOX ® ) In case patient receive LOVENOX intravenous injection curative dose 100 kg IU/10 .
